title: tyzen
author: tyzen
content: I need a Dice Game!I have a website that using login and register system, deposit and balance systemso i need a dice game, where my users can do bet with his account_balance1. PHP Based2. Mysqli1. Users system2. Bet Higher or Lower 3. Bet number from 1-99994. User only can bet if user balance enough5. User bets history all time. User bet history today, All users bet history in real time6. House edge 2%7. Manual Bets and Auto BetsUsers - account_balanceNo scammer please, dont waste my time

comments.body: Hey there! Our company has an experience in developing such games. You can see an example here: https://exio.tech/case-study/sloto-dice-case-study/So I think we can help you with this. If you need help write me or reach us here for a call: https://exio.tech/contact-us/

comments.body: So in fact you need freebitco script, no? Maybe contact them, they will sell it to you with a small customization package.Do you want to launch an another 'casino'?

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: Why did you use the term Mysqli ? That i is generally used for injection .

comments.author: sr22398
comments.body: Hello,I would like to assist you with your requirement.Please reach me at Skype or Email.Skype - cis.sethEmail - seth@cisinlabs.comThanksSeth R

comments.author: Initscri
comments.body: Quote from: CCMS on September 19, 2022, 07:24:02 AMWhy did you use the term Mysqli ? That i is generally used for injection .MySQLi is a library under PHP - the I doesn't stand for injection - it's fine with prepared statementshttps://www.php.net/manual/en/book.mysqli.phpI'm available for work if you're still looking
